stimulusHtml: Let S be the region enclosed by the graphs of y = 2x and y = 2x2 for 0≤x≤1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BF0@ . What is the volume of the solid generated when S is revolved about the line y = 3?
choicesHtml: π ∫ 0 1 ( ( 3−2 x 2 ) 2 − ( 3−2x ) 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BAD@ dx
